objects.text: Bring Summer's Golden Glow to Your Garden!
Large 3-4" Blooms • Heat & Drought Tolerant • Attracts Butterflies & Pollinators
Blooms Continuously • Perfect for Garden Beds & Containers • Easy to Grow

product_details.name: Vibrant Mexican Sunflower (Tithonia) - Bring Summer's Golden Glow to Your Garden!
product_details.description:
• Stunning orange-gold petals with dark center disc for eye-catching garden display
• Large 3-4 inch daisy-like blooms perfect for borders and butterfly gardens
• Long, sturdy stem ideal for cut flower arrangements
• Heat and drought tolerant annual flower
• Attracts pollinators like butterflies, bees, and hummingbirds
• Easy to grow and maintain - perfect for beginner gardeners
• Blooms continuously from summer through fall
• Reaches heights of 4-6 feet, creating dramatic garden backdrop
• Perfect for both garden beds and container planting
• Seeds can be harvested for next season's planting

banner_details:
The banner features a summery aesthetic with a bold, vibrant radial background created from layered geometric rays in varying opacities and shades of yellow, orange, and green. At its center is the "product_image" of a sunflower that visually anchors the composition and draws the viewer’s focus. The "heading" uses a bold, playful sans-serif font in a deep earthy tone, establishing an enthusiastic mood. The "subheading" complements it with a handwritten script in a vivid orange-red for a warm seasonal appeal. Two horizontal text blocks ("description_1" and "description_2") in forest green provide additional product features. The "price" is prominently displayed in bright orange, paired with a rounded "cta_button" in a saturated amber color, containing white "cta" text. The layout maintains center alignment, enhancing clarity and symmetry.

**Color Palette:**
- Sun Yellow: `#FFEB3B`
- Golden Amber: `#FFC107`
- Burnt Orange: `#E65100`
- Fresh Green: `#8BC34A`
- Forest Green: `#2E5B0A`
- Deep Brown: `#56400D`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image features a single orange daisy flower set against a white background, creating a clean, minimalist visual. The petals are a vibrant **orange (#F4A300)**, with soft shadows and highlights adding depth. Subtle darker streaks on the petals in **burnt orange (#D97D00)** enhance texture and realism. The flower's center blends **dark brown (#3D2C1E)** and **green (#2C4A1F)**, giving it a contrasting focal point. The slender stem fades from **olive green (#5B6E2A)** to a deeper **dark green (#2A3A14)**, integrating earthy tones. This warm, organic palette is ideal for a natural or eco-friendly advertisement banner, balancing brightness and harmony.
